article_title: Drone attack on Israel puts spotlight on Iron Dome's limitations
sentence: Hezbollah’s  attack  on  an  army  base  near  Binyamina  in  northern  Israel  on  Sunday,  which  killed  four  men  and  injured  dozens  more,  was  the  most  damaging  drone  strike  on  the  country  to  date.

article_title: Drone attack on Israel puts spotlight on Iron Dome's limitations
sentence: Earlier  in  October  the  Israel  Defense  Forces  (IDF)  said  a  drone  launched  from  Iraq  killed  two  soldiers  in  the  Golan  Heights.

article_title: Drone attack on Israel puts spotlight on Iron Dome's limitations
sentence: One  was  shot  down  and  the  other  disappeared    –  presumed  crashed  –  so  no  warning  siren  was  triggered.
